summary: IVE BEEN DEALING WITH CAR DEFECT CARWILL SHUTDOWN WHILE I WAS DRIVING   AFTER   WERE IT WILL  IT SEVERAL TIMES TO THE DEALER AND WEREN'T NEVER ABLE TO SOLVE ISSUE  AND WAS OFFER A REPLACEMENT ALMOST FOR TWO YEARS, AND THEY HAD PROMISE  SO ALT IF TIME TO GIVE ME A NEW CAR CURRENTLY MY CAMARO  HAS BEEN IN THE DEALER SINCE JAN 15 2019 BEEN STRUGGLE WITH NO VEHICLE  IS CURRENTLY JUSTOFEER THE BUYBACK CARING LESS THAT ALL THIS HAS AFFECTING ME TO POINT OF HAVING TO BE UNDER MEDICAL CARE WITH ANXIETY GM CARING LESS PLEASE HELP
